body: A new Pyra and Mythra Doujin without Rape or NTR? Amazing. Thank you artsits! I can't wait for it to get translated!

The shitty artist give more pages to Pyra.
Fuck that shit.
She did the same in the Mythra solo book, fucking Pyra fangirl.
While it’s a bit disappointing it’s less than 15 pages of actual action, I applaud artists for having them keep their excruciatingly detailed clothes on.
Can't wait for this in english
